title: Google Pixel 3 unresponsive and hard reset not working.
content:
I am on holiday in Croatia and my pixel phone froze and got the "black screen of death" while I was uploading pictures. 

I followed the steps outlined in the support article and other threads here with a similar issues. 

I tried to hard reset by pressing the power button and the volume down key and even tried a hard restart but the phone is still unresponsive. 

Is there a number / email I can contact support with? Also, is there any other way I can reset the phone? 

I do not mind losing all the data, just want to get the phone back on!
